snippet: It was unclear whether a nearby office of the Turkish government, which has been on the offensive against Kurdish separatists, was the target of the attack.
lead_paragraph: It was unclear whether a nearby office of the Turkish government, which has been on the offensive against Kurdish separatists, was the target of the attack.

headline.main: Suicide Bomber Kills 2 Amid Turkish Crackdown on Kurds
headline.print_headline: Suicide Bomber Kills 2 Amid Turkish Crackdown on Kurds
headline.seo: Suicide Bomber Kills 2 in Kurdish Town in Turkey
